mapper.select: select * from route r join users u on u.user_id=r.user_id where route_no = #{routeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into route(route_name,route_content ,route_full,route_date,user_id) values (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일에 저장한 경로"' ) ,'메모작성을 할 수 있습니다',#{routeFull},sysdate,#{userId})
mapper.select: select count(*) from route where user_id=#{userId}
select * from route r join users u on u.user_id=r.user_id where r.user_id = #{userId}

select * from(select sub.*,rownum rnum from (select * from route r join users u on u.user_id=r.user_id where r.user_id = #{userId} order by route_no desc) sub) where rnum between #{page}*3-2 and #{page}*3
select * from route where rownum between 1 and 4 order by route_no desc
